dict.acceptation: 同伴；男子；（大学的）研究员；（某些学院或大学的）董事；
同伴的；同事的；同类的；同情况的；
使…与另一个对等；使…与另一个匹敌；

sent.orig: Truly, compares other members the big fellow, this young fellow appears very small truly.
sent.trans: 确实，相比其他队员的大块头，这位小将确实显得很小。

sent.orig: Jim is a rather interesting fellow (rather an interesting fellow).
sent.trans: 吉姆是一个颇为有趣的人。

sent.orig: The little fellow does what he can; the big fellow does what he wants.
sent.trans: 小人物做他能做的，大人物做他想做的。

sent.orig: Phelps is a Fellow of the National Academy ofa Distinguished Fellow of the American Economic Association.
sent.trans: 菲尔普斯还担任美国科学院院士，美国经济学协会荣誉会员。

sent.orig: There was little relaxation of that suspiciousness with which many Americans regard their fellow-travelers.
sent.trans: 许多美国人对待旅伴的那种猜疑却丝毫也没有减弱。
